column4: Please help! Im 2 days into my linux life and I read for about a month before i installed and this problem with nvidia x server is making me lose faith
like I started with I have been to 10 forums and about 30 post using solved in my search but nothing that mentions my issue
what are you trying to do ?

google split screen nvidia in linux and then look under the video results there was a howto on that I saw a while back ... but my nvidia card died before I ever got it to work ... I know its not really an answer but it might get you to where you need
